Name: Bijou (by Jamie Gordon)
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Green Chartreuse (or alternative herbal liqueur)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill an Old-fashioned glass .
Prepare garnish of orange zest twist.
EXPRESS orange zest twist over the cocktail and use as garnish.
Review: This bittersweet digestivo is one of those drinks that becomes easier and gets better as dilution, from the melting ice, opens and softens.
History: Adapted from a 2018 recipe by Jamie Gordon, San Francisco, USA.
Nutrition: One serving of Bijou (by Jamie Gordon) contains 209 calories
